name: HistoplasmosisTestsForHistoplasmaCapsulatumAntibodyTiterByComplementFixationMethod
title: Histoplasmosis (Tests for Histoplasma capsulatum Antibody [Titer] by complement fixation method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Histoplasma capsulatum Antibody by complement fixation method),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Histoplasmosis Ab; Titer; complement fixation),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
